creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: sixed lobed, covered, engraved coat of arms
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Engraved on the cover of each dish are the arms of Edward Bootle-Wilbraham, baron Skelmersdale.  The crest of Wilbraham is engraved on one leg of each stand and on the spirit lamp.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of both dished and the interior rim of both lids.  Both finials with makerâ€™s mark, sovereign\'s head, and lion passant.  Lion passant on nut securing finial of .1.  Dish, cover, and finial of .1 stamped with the number 3.  Dish, cover, and finial of .2 stamped with the number 4.  The underside of each dish stamped [MAKEPEACE/LONDON].  The outer side of one leg of each stand, the base of the spirit lamp, and the removable wick holders of each spirit lamp are fully marked (maker\'s mark [AM] in rectangle, and date letter for 1873).
object_name: Covered Serving Set, one of a pair
title: Covered Serving Set, one of a pair
